website_summaries.verdict: With a 45-minute safety timer, this blanket is the perfect choice to keep you warm during a chilly commute or keep a child warm in his carseat.
pros: Measures 58 inches L by  42 inches W. Safety timer
Choice of red plaid or black
cons: 12V plug may slide out of cigarette lighter jack

customer_reviews.title: ... don't care how much my family and friends make fun of me
customer_reviews.text: I don't care how much my family and friends make fun of me, guess who is warm on the drive into work and guess who isn't!? Only thing I noticed is there is no "Low-Med-High" settings, there is only an option to have it on for 30 or 45 mins. I end up plugging it in for like 10-15 mins to let it warm up, then unplugging and it stays warm for my 45 min drive into work. Plus... I feel like a lumberjack. :D
customer_reviews.author: Senista

customer_reviews.title: The blanket is supposed to warm up the wearer, not the other way around.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is supposed to warm up the wearer, not the other way around. This thing barely gets warm at all, and definitely not anywhere near hot. It's full of warning labels but there's no point to them. Tried again in case I just got a bad one, but no, same result with 2nd one. Want a good heated blanket? Keep looking, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Sterley

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is large, soft and already warm without it being plugged in. The cord is long enough to plug in up front while it is being used in the back seat (we have a mid size SUV). It warms up within a few minutes of plugging it in and it's just cozy for the little one to be comfortable since we can't have a winter coat on while in the car seat. I unplug it when we are not using it, even when the car is off because I haven't seen an off button. But it does have a timer of 30 minutes or 45 minutes so that is nice. Recommend and happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: stradman

customer_reviews.title: I encourage you to use this product for a while, before submitting a review
customer_reviews.text: My first unit worked four times, then didn't. The second unit actually lasted for a few days, before it suddenly quit working. - DO NOT BUY THIS AS A GIFT!!! Update: I have been using the replacement blanket for a couple of months now. Basically every day. It draws about 53 watts of power, pretty economical for an electric blanket. I still can't recommend giving this as a gift, due to the previous failure.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for winter driving comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful blanket to have in a Superduty. I use a little bungie with clips to keep it folded and up against the driver seat-back and I plug it into the powerpoint receptacle as soon as I get in these winter mornings. Who needs a $1000 heated seat accessory. The blanket can be unfolded to cover one's front as well. It's worked fine for a month now. I will amend this review as time goes on and stuff happens, or doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Yeah it worked but I wasn’t sweating let’s say
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my custom jeep fold out bed in 30 degree weather , the first night I did not and froze lol andthe second nighg I set it up I woke up 3x to push the reset button being that it only stays on for 45 min at a time for safety . Seems like it helped under my sleeping bag keeping my bag that little extra bit so I gave it 4 star only because I feel there could be more heater elements spread through the blanket instead of the few existing along the center portion .
customer_reviews.author: Justo

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a dear friend and she loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a dear friend and she loves it. Looked at other electic blankets but the reviews were less than flattery,especially for the cheaper ones that either quit working after a short time or, ugh, tended to melt or catch fire. This cost a little more but seems to be worth it. Warms up quickly in frigid weather, uses her truck's cigarette lighter slot to energize it and, best o all, shuts off after she leaves the vehicle so the battery doesn't drain needlessly. Keeps her legs toasty warn and, a side benefit, can keep the take home dinner very warm so one doesn't have to zap it in the microwave. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Ross

customer_reviews.title: Money waste
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be perfect since heater quit working in car but not any different than a regular blanket. You can feel through the blanket where cord runs & can feel it very, very, very slightly a tiny bit warm but most DEFINATELY not going to warm you. NOT what was expected. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Worst travel heated blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Blanket 12 volt plug does not stay plugged in. The slightest bump or movement and it stops working. As for heating once you get it to stay plugged in, is very very minimal. You get more warth from the actual blanket than the heating element.
customer_reviews.author: Emoore

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after using only twice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my son who travels a lot for snowboarding. He was super excited when he opened it. After using only a couple of times it stopped working, & won't heat up. I'm very disappointed I'm unable to return for a refund or replacement. Apparently it's not a quality item. VERY DISAPPOINTING!
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: but it warms up quickly and keep a nice overall feel to it when having to wait for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. She'd moved here from California to Kansas where it gets a lot COLDER. The blanket as many say doesn't get hot, but it warms up quickly and keep a nice overall feel to it when having to wait for the car to warm up in KS winters.
customer_reviews.author: highvoltagerocknrollradioshow

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble, just run the heater.
customer_reviews.text: Working night security, bought this to reduce the time I idle my vehicle to stay warm. Barely worked the first night, only a small area of the blanket warmed up, it has not worked since. Lights come on but it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Medina

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly Wuggly winter win!
customer_reviews.text: Snuggly & warm!!! I toast myself up daily. Imma stan for this product. It’s electric so the cleaning process is to spot clean it (I have spilled so much Caribou Coffee on this thing!) but that’s my downfall, thus far. I have only used it for a few months but I love! Buy more than one-for those friends that want to snowbird it but are stuck with winter temps.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Skyes

customer_reviews.title: Small but warm
customer_reviews.text: Whatever size you imagine this to be, it is half that. It has a lot of loose lint that gets on clothing. Aside from those, it works very well. It warms up in less than five minutes and stays warm until the timer stops. I have been using it with an 18,000mAh battery pack/jumpstarter for outdoor use. After 30 minutes it drains the pack about 30% (100 - 65 during use). Even in 40 degrees Fahrenheit it warms enough to be comfortable. Inside a sleeping bag, it is a nice toaster. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: We go camping in the winter and the drive up was a little too cold for her so I ordered this heating blanket and it worked great
customer_reviews.text: Had some heating issues in my Jeep, it was OK for me but not the girlfriend. We go camping in the winter and the drive up was a little too cold for her so I ordered this heating blanket and it worked great and kept her warm. I also have mini van for work that I have an air mattress for (like camper on wheels). During deer season I park out along the trails and use this to keep warm at night.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Wojo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: The worst blanket EVER! I had a heated blanket much like this that was amazing until I wore it out after using it for 3 years, so I thought it was time for a new blanket. Sadly this company added a timer to the blanket and with only 25-30 uses/ within a month, the blanket stopped working. I am VERY DISAPPOINTED & DISGUSTED with the product. Save your money! (Granted if you can find one without the timer I would get it)
customer_reviews.author: Corrie

customer_reviews.title: So Nice for the Car!
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with this because I always travel with a regular blanket in the car during the winter months. This plugs into the cigarette lighter. After 45 minutes it automatically shuts off. To restart you just press the restart button. It gets only a bit warm but not hot. I would have rated it a full 5 stars for temperature control if it had a variable temperature control and could get warmer, like an electric blanket. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Nice, if it works right out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift, but didn't get it to the recipient for months. It didn't work when opened (The blanket part was OK. The heater circuit wouldn't turn on). It was too late to return it. So I opened it up to see what was wrong. It was WIRED INCORRECTLY, and it burned out the timer circuit....hence no heat. I bypassed the timer to get the LED and heat to work, and just remember to unplug it when done. It provides a very nice warmth on those chilly rides, and is good even unplugged. But the controller quality stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph W Dowdell III

customer_reviews.title: ... to 12 hours to MB we use to dress like we were going to the North Pole because my ...
customer_reviews.text: Every vacation we drive 10 to 12 hours to MB we use to dress like we were going to the North Pole because my husband likes to freeze us w the air conditioning. So I bought 2 of these 2nd best purchase to date iv made for our vacation 1st being the sweat shirt w ear buds built in so I don't have to hear my mother in laws humming for 12 hours! We never leave home w/o these blankets!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Not too hot, but definitely effective ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not too hot, but definitely effective. My dog wraps himself up in this in the back of my car while I'm at work (3 seasons of the year). I find the spring on the cigarette / 12v outlet to big a little bit strong (squirts out of the outlet 1/8", which it wouldn't do if the spring were weaker/shorter), but it mostly stays in the outlet. The first one broke after 3 weeks, and Amazon replaced it. The second one has given us no problems. On a future production run, they need to shorten the length of the spring inside the outlet plug.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine S.

customer_reviews.title: It gets really warm which is great, but it's also a tad bit too short
customer_reviews.text: It gets really warm which is great, but it's also a tad bit too short. You either have to sacrifice your ankles or your shoulders to stay warm. It's perfect for mobility and travel. You can keep the windows open for fresh air and not worry about getting cold at all. It's easy to fold, you can't wash it though so be careful with spills. It does take some time to heat up, but it holds constant heat afterwards. The cables don't get in the way and it has a timer too just in case you fall asleep while using it.
customer_reviews.author: A.Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Out of package, Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this blanket for my car. I live in central california. It doesnt get too cold here unlike the midwest but i needed something to keep me warm while driving in the morning since i have no heater. Well i bought this and plugged it into my cigarette lighter and the red light on the cigarette plug in works but not on the control pack. The red power light doesnt come on at all. I plugged a pbone charger to see if my cigarette lighter wasnt working but it was. For 30 minutes i had this blanket plugged in and it never got warm.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Makes my morning drive into work much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.text: Got it because my seat warmer doesn't work. You plug it in and it starts automatically, and you can set it to run for either 30 or 45 mins- the only way to start it (or stop it if it's a shorter drive) is to plug it in/out. The first couple of times I used it, it took about 15 mins just to start feeling it getting warm, but after you've broken it in it only takes about 3-5 to be noticeably warm. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: nice & toasty, as long as the car is moving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stay warm if I pulled over at night. If the car is off, and it is just drawing off of the battery, does not stay very warm, but it does work somewhat. When the car is running, however, it's very nice and toasty warm. it is quite a soft cuddly blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. KRM

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works well for us. My husband needs to ride lying down, and this makes those winter rides more comfortable. It is actually under him, but tucked inside a sleeping bag so it doesn't get too warm against the skin. One thing to note - you need to unplug from the cigarettes lighter or it will continue to draw on the battery after the car is turned off. However, it is on an automatic timer (30 or 45 minutes, I think) so the time I forgot, it didn't suck all the life out of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: MN Hope

customer_reviews.title: I loved the idea of this and used it a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this and used it a couple of times and it does not warm up effectively. After about 2 months the part that goes into the lighter port in the car, broke into several peices and can't be fixed. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your seats don't heat up, use this.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a friend who suffers from arthritis. Living in NY, we get some cold winters. When my friend starts her car, not only does put the heater on but plugs this in to the cigarette outlet. So when the car is warm so is she and avoids stiffening altogether. SHE LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: JKH-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gift for my sister who is always cold. She and my nephew ended up fighting over it! They have a pretty long drive to school/work in the mornings and here in Iowa, that can be very cold. This has helped keep them warm on cold mornings where they are waiting for their car to warm up. Great gift giving idea.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a blanket that is going to be kept in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not machine washable. Instructions for cleaning are to wipe down with wet towel. I feel like a blanket that is going to be kept in a car during cold months which implies snow and dirt should be able to be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Some things just make me happy. Warm feet in the car is one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Some things just make me happy. Warm feet in the car is one of them, and I love this blanket for that reason! I am looking for a storage bag for it though so I can keep it clean between use in the back of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Ann P Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The heat in my car went out and this blanket has been a short term fix. It heats up super fast. The only think I wish is that you could control the temp. I run cold so no heat is a nightmare for me even when the blanket isn't plugged in its super warm and very soft. I love this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Superactual Assbutt

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!  Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket for my wife to use on a weekend RZR trip. It’s good size for personal use. It worked awesome at keeping her warm and happy while out riding in the woods in 10-20 degree weather. This along with good gloves, and a heated jacket kept her happy. Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Leon G

customer_reviews.title: Work's great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Road trip thu mid west. Heated quickly. Great for those cold mornings, and warming up after getting in or out of pick-up truck. It's a little pricey. But was a treat to have on a long trip with no seat warmers. Also it works plugged in with engine off.
customer_reviews.author: RAVEN

customer_reviews.title: Nice 12v heated blanket
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Plad design looks nice Makes a big difference in comfort on cold days Very efficient considering the low electrical draw Wide enough for two people sitting across from each other 12v cord is good length Automatic shut off Cons: No High / low setting
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Product is a good idea but not well executed
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good product at first, but if you spill anything on it it cant be washed, maybe I didn't leave it plugged in long enough but it didn't seem to warm up. Also I told my girlfriend that some of the reviews said they light on fire and she didn't want to use it soooo maybe just invest in a quality sleeping bag or blanket rather than this death blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Heats up a little bit but not as much as i was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: At 48 watts (12v and 4amps) one cant expect too much heat. Still I was hoping for a little bit more heat out of it. Still works great for my kids in the car. On the plus side I dont have to worry about it getting too hot for them.
customer_reviews.author: S.F. Hirmiz

customer_reviews.title: Barely warm.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of a heated blanket, but his one just did not fill the bill. I felt like it got barely warm and while I know some people liked the large size, I did not. I am small and drive a small car and was always afraid the excess was going to get caught under my feet while I drove. However, my husband I shared it in his larger car and it was just the right size. For me, a regular fleece blanket works better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic plug
customer_reviews.text: Would be five stars except for the cheap plastic plug. We like this and just bought our second one. We use it to keep our chihuahua warm for a few minutes when we leave him in the car. The first one would probably still be working fine, but the power connector is made of the cheapest possible plastic. It is at the end of a long cord and breaks very easily when it drops and hits the concrete floor. We were able to repair it a couple times, but had to buy a second when we could no longer repair the cigarette lighter power connector.
customer_reviews.author: F J F Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Sadly it stopped working after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use in my van. I do a lot of driving and with it being winter I figured this would be great. I got my first blanket and it worked for about 5 uses then it quit. I returned it fir another one and this one never worked at all. I was very disappointed as I was really looking forward to having a blanket to help keep me warm. I would have tried a third time but figured I’d better save my money.
customer_reviews.author: dibs

customer_reviews.title: Nice 12V heated blanket for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket, but kinda small. Keeps my legs warm on the boat on really cold nights and draws minimal power. 1 deep cycle battery can handle it for 10 hrs continuous or 20 cycles at 30 min on the timer. I cycle it 2 - 4 times in a night depending, so that gives me 2 - 5 nights before lowering the battery to 50%. This works excellent as that little extra warmth you always need on a boat for drafts where you want to sleep. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robneck

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heat Blanket, not so good zipper case.
customer_reviews.text: This 12 volt blanket is really nice way to stay comfortable down to the teen's or 20's. Just wrap, turn it on and enjoy. The only drawback is the plastic case and a zipper that is sure to fail.
customer_reviews.author: UT8K

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this blanket
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has an autoimmune disease called Sjogren's Syndrome, my feet (and hands) are constantly freezing, even when it's warm outdoors. This travel blanket has been a real blessing, especially this past winter, and it's such a pleasure to arrive at our destination with my feet toasty warm. We've also used it when we have our grandchildren in the backseat and they have loved staying cozy warm under this blanket. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm for winter driving!
customer_reviews.text: I used the all winter long and absolutely loved it! It was great for driving too and from work as well as downtown. My only complaint would be how long the cord is, but then I realized I could plug the blanket in and cover my daughter in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: it's very nice. I got in my car the other morning ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's not a full sized blanket and there doesn't seem to be an off switch. But aside from that, it's very nice. I got in my car the other morning wearing my heated jacket, turned on the heated seat and put this blanket across my lap and was so comfortable, I was concerned I might fall asleep. Construction appears fine, but this is not the type of thing I would allow children to use unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Rockytop

customer_reviews.title: Best car purchase I’ve made
customer_reviews.text: This keeps me warm for hours of long car rides! Plus when our diesel takes a while to warm this blanket is already warm and snuggly before the truck is! It’s nice to have for after playing in the snow, getting wet on the quads etc as you can heat up quickly. It’s easy to clean and folds up to take up little space. This by far is my favorite car accessory we have!
customer_reviews.author: Lilmissb

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Best gift idea ever! my wife has loved this...it allows her to bundle up on trips across town or out of town and stay warm while I still have air on me. The size is perfect for the vehicle and it heats up quickly. I do wish it would stay on longer since on long trips you have to reset it every 45min. A manual constant on would make this perfect but it still is a great product. Flannel material is nice and warm even without the added heat. We have not washed ours yet so not sure how that will work...
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in the car
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it kept me toasty and warm because my hubby likes it cooler when he drives. We drive from Iowa to Georgia every winter and I use it both ways.
customer_reviews.author: l. morse

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket for people who get very cold.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this blanket and so do I. It allows me to keep the temp in the truck below the boiling point so I don't smother and she still stays warm. Only had it about a month so I don't know about the longevity but it heats up quickly and gets very warm. My wife really likes that it gets warm way before the truck has a chance to warm up.
customer_reviews.author: J.h.B.d.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Had only one preset temperature and ran for 45 minutes. No time or temp options. Got a few uses include one cold night camping and then it died.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: amazing blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket it my buddy in the car. I am very cold natured and my husband is not. So when we travel one of us is not comfortable and it is usually my sweet husband. So now we are both comfortable when we travel. The blanket is soft, just the right size for the car and it heats very well to keep you warm. My order got to my home within the time Amazon told me it would. Amazon to is the best to buy anything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This heating blanket is a life saver! My daughter has temperature control issues and cannot leave the house without her temp dropping so low that she becomes hypothermic but with this blanket, she can go out and stay warm!! This blanket is an absolute must have!
customer_reviews.author: Stefany F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping warm on long trips
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. When on road trips, my husband freezes me out. This blanket is great and keeps me toasty warm. I like that it has a timer for 30 or 45 minutes. Plugs in the lighter outlet in our car, and I have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in our rock bouncer. It is so warm and cozy! Just plug it in the cigarette lighter and warmth!! The fabric is thick, soft and a cute pattern. When this one quits working, I will buy another! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: ARBlondie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Heats up almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who gets cold in the car this is a must have. I put this thing on me when I first get in the car in the morning on my commute and it keeps me toasty until the car heats up and the heat can do its' job. This is a great product. Heats up almost immediately...no waiting like normal seat warmers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timer does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: First night with this I dozed off. I woke a couple hours later and it was still running. The timer doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me toasty in my car
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I can't say it gets hot, more like warm, but it is perfect for my needs. The heater doesn't work in my car and occasionally it gets cold in California (hard to imagine) so when it's 48 degrees out, this cozy blanket is just enough warmth to keep me toasty while driving and now I don't have to spend $300 to investigate my car heater issues when I only need it 15 days out of the year to start with! If you live someplace cold you're still gonna need that car heater but if you're always the chilly one in the car on family road trips this is just what you need!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my partner in our old minivan
customer_reviews.text: The minivan takes a while to warm up but this blanket is warm very quickly. She was thrilled about it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: bearded love

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great heated car seat for those cold winter mornings!
customer_reviews.text: My '09 Malibu doesn't have heated seats, and that makes it a bit chilly out there in the driveway this time of year. But this inexpensive, soft & comfortable heated blanket is very easy to put over the seat, tuck in the edges, and then plug in for seat heat. It does take about 10 min to warm up, and it never gets really hot, but it is so much better than no seat heat at all. For the price, this is a very nice blanket, and it doesn't feel like it has wires running all through it, so it is comfy to sit on. I recommend this product as a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality/cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Seems like only the front half heats up. The power cord is coming out of the fabric and now only a matter of time before it breaks off unless I make a repair! Not something I should have to do on a new heated blanket!
customer_reviews.author: rhaspyhonker

customer_reviews.title: ... and the 30 to 45 minute timer it's a great failsafe in case you fall asleep however the major ...
customer_reviews.text: Blankets work well and the 30 to 45 minute timer it's a great failsafe in case you fall asleep however the major drawback of this is that it will drain your car's battery in under 3 hours. I thought since it said low draw on the package that I could at least run it for four to five however I was sadly mistaken when I had to get a jump from a nice friendly man in the parking lot as I was freezing with a blanket that wasn't working and a car that wouldn't now start
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hanyon

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep feet warm when camping.
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great for my wife and I so far on some chilly nights camping. Size is perfect to cover our feet and lower legs. If you're a smaller person, you may get full body coverage out of it. Like most electric blankets, it works best if you have it under another layer of covers.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: 1st try is Defective
customer_reviews.text: Received the blanket timely, and the quality of the blanket is very good, soft and comfortable. One major problem was the heating unit did not work when trying multiple plugs in various cars. I am returning it to see what the seller will do in regards to a replacement. I will update this review should it turn out positive. Otherwise, I do not recommend purchasing if you are looking for a blanket to heat up in the car.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerAdvocate

customer_reviews.title: Live in North Dakota
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for our trip to school in the mornings. She LOVES it! Once I drop her off then I use it too! Might have to get a second.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Gudmunsen

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice but the material feels cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as soft as I thought it would be, it feels like a cheaply made wool sweater, not very heavy, but I hope it heats up very well. It was bought as a Christmas gift so I hope it will do justice the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: MissM

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My first blanket didn't work. Only one small area (about one foot square) on the blanket worked. I exchanged it very easily, however, and I did it through email contact only. I just asked for a return shipping label and a new blanket and it was done immediately. The new blanket arrived very quickly, and worked, but it barely warms up. It's still a warm blanket anyway and I keep it in my SUV. I plug it in and keep my lap warm while the rest of the vehicle heats up during the really subzero days here in Minnesota - which are very many this year!
customer_reviews.author: S.Proulx

customer_reviews.title: does not work in a RZR
customer_reviews.text: I tried so many times in my RZR and it did not heat up even the slitest. I am giving it a 3 because the packing and shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: This blanket actually heats up, and fast
customer_reviews.text: Super happy, finally! After buying two others from different sellers that barley felt warm, i was reluctant to buy a third. Glad i did, this blanket heats fast and has auto shut off with two options.I am so impressed with this blanket. I wold defiantly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kdick

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t get super hot, which is great when I’m just cold ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get super hot, which is great when I’m just cold but I got it to use for my back pain in the car and it doesn’t get hot enough to help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Has a 45 minute limit
customer_reviews.text: It was a good idea, but it will only let you keep it on for 30 minutes or 45 minutes. I got this to help keep my girlfriend warm because i always run way hot and her way cold. Well, with the 45 minute shut off if you fall asleep you wake up freezing. Also, there is no way to regulate the temperature like there is on all other heating blankets that i have ever used. It is just one heat level and its not all that hot, more like a warm, so over all I'm not to happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After just one use the control module on this burnt out. The fuse in the ciggy style charger was just fine...it was the module that turns it off and on. Very disappointed. Won’t buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Katie33kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blanket. I ride 4 wheelers in the winter time during some pretty cold temperatures. With being able to plug this into a 12 volt plug in I can lay this across my lap and stay warm while playing in the snow. With the built in timer I don't have to worry about leaving it on too long and killing the battery. Great item for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Worked a couple times, then...nothing. Would not buy again. (Plus not long enough to cover feet and pull up to neck).
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Reviews ORG

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have some spoiled dogs in my household. One of them hates getting into the car when it's cold. I have this thing plugged in and ready to go and he is much happier and it keeps his old bones warm. He really does love it. I've never tried it myself but I know it works since I stick my hand in his crate occasionally to see if it is warm, and it always is. It doesn't get 'too' hot though which is great. I would recommend for spoiled dogs or humans :)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have a quality bag for blanket that could attach on the back of seat wh3n not in use, but want to keep in the car during the cold months
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: A great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I had chemo, my toes get so cold it's almost unbearable. I bought this blanket for two purposes: to use in the car while traveling (and not driving) and to use with my golf cart while playing. Have used it ALOT and I love it. Just wish it had an "off" switch. You have to unplug it to turn it off unless the timer happens to turn it off for you at the right time. It's a nice, heavy weight fabric and the long cord is wonderful. I highly recommend this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Katybug

customer_reviews.title: Great heat up time and size
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this blanket because our car heater went out and a friend suggested this blanket. We love it! Our trip to work is 10 minutes and the blanket is heated up usually about half way there. It easily stretches over the driver and passenger seat in our SUV for 2 people to share comfortably. Best advice we got was to make sure you unplug to the blanket each time you get out of the car as not kill your car battery.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my girlfriend always gets cold in my car and I got tired of hearing her complain. Also we were taking a trip to the mountains in the winter and I thought I would head off the complaints before they started. So she used the blanket on the trip and loved it. It never got too hot and did shut off when my car was turned off. I suppose it may stay on if your car will allow for this. Either way, she still uses it all of the time and she is happy which is fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Give the gift of warmth and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Both my Moms LOVE this electric blanket for the car. They say it every time we get into the cold car on a cold day as they snuggle in its warmth. The best gift ever! Who knew?!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Worked about 4 times, and now doesn't turn on at all. Was never abused/misused in anyway, so very disappointed with overall quality and longevity. Will request a return or exchange as mine was obviously fault... are they all like this?
customer_reviews.author: John Varga

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Wife loved it for 3 hr trip to mountains. Got warm quick. Really likes timer.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product! Love having this in the car when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! Love having this in the car when kids get cold. It heats up just like the heating blankets you plug into the wall at home! We have been using it several times a week for 6 months and it's still working like the day we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I would rather it didn’t shut off. It gets warm I wouldn’t say hot. All in all I use it in my tractor at work and it does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Ups man

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: My sensory seeking child enjoys this blanket. Cord is long enough. We used the blanket at the drive in theater during colder weather and it kept my child warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: NerfGirl

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: heats up as well as my home blanket. also like the regular ones- they are much warmer if covered by another blanket or folded over. soft, not itchy. doesn't seem to pick up dirt easily
customer_reviews.author: it's me

customer_reviews.title: Works all right
customer_reviews.text: It has 2 settings. The highest setting is maybe a medium setting for most heated throws. PRO: it will keep you warm on long car trips. CON: the cord that connects to the cigarette lighter does tend to come out fairly easily. If you move around even a little, the cord comes right out. Still, it's better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This electric blanket, powered by 12 volts DC current, was something I bought for the car this winter -- expecting very little. How warm would something of this lower voltage be? You'll be surprised! It heats twice as fast as the car's heater when the car and the blanket are started at the same time. It works well for me. My only complaint: it's not machine washable or dryable -- and it loads with static easily. I have not tried static-guard or anything like that on it yet -- maybe that'll help. For the price -- an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Plazek

customer_reviews.title: It has a timer on it which is a great feature.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to heat up so done count on instant heat. By the time your car is warm this would also be warm. My main purpose is to use it during cold camping trips amd plug it into our duracell 600 battery pack for when we sleep. When it os heated up combined with your sleeping bag, it gets really toasty. It has a timer on it which is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: L.Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Sometimes when I'm in the car for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Sometimes when I'm in the car for long drives, my legs begin to ache. This blanket worked wonderfully to eliminate the pain. There are two timer settings that make me feel confident that if I forget to unplug it, the blanket will turn off automatically. I've never been a fan of electric blankets, but this is a mind changer. Anxious to use it camping.
customer_reviews.author: teambyrne

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Blanket itself extremely cheap but beyond that plugged it in and the thing barely got hot very disappointing and not usable I’d rather just buy a high-quality blanket and snuggle with that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great on our side by side ATV on rides in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our side by side ATV on rides in the fall and spring, now friends have ordered them after seeing how warm I stayed. It does not get hot by it kept me comfortable. Keep an eye on the auto off but it is nice if you stop so it doesn't drain your battery.
customer_reviews.author: Darla K.

customer_reviews.title: Melting Dogs & Toasty Toes SOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: Planning to use this 2 ways: 1) Car-on myself while traveling with my dog so that I don't have to turn the heat up so high. In the winter, I freeze and she pants & melts. 2) Plug into my battery while spending winter nights aboard my sailboat=toasty toes. Haven't used it yet, but the blanket is nice and thick, appears well made, and arrived on time, packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Love my heated car seat =)
customer_reviews.text: I drive an old pickup and this helps keep my vinyl bench seat warm in winter. I love having this blanket. I only wish it had seatbelt buckle holes and straps to stay hooked to the seat and then it would be even better, but then it would also be another product and probably way more expensive. Great warmth and functionality for the price. Well made. Good length of cord. Like the timer options to keep the blanket from staying on too long and wasting battery life.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Sitko

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Nice blanket for the car. It doesn’t get that cold here in California so the blanket works well here. I’m not to sure how it would be in a really chilly climate. It’s nice to have in the car when you’re traveling a case anyone gets cold. Then if you have more than one they’ll be fighting over it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Good blanket
customer_reviews.text: My husband has cancer and is going through chemo. He is always freezing. I got this for him to keep him warm in vehicles. He drives a semi and the truck isn't always warm enough. He said the blanket warms up fast enough and warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, not very warm.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my kids because we don't have a garage and our car gets really cold in the winter. Was hoping these would be warm for the 30 minute rides to school, but they don't get warm enough to have any advantage over a nice fleece blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Hilburn

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for the car rides for the dog. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for the car rides for the dog. I put this in the back of my car for the dog while the heater is still warming up. She has little to no fur so she much appreciates this blanket. Never gets too hot for her, just the right temp. Always turns off at the setting you choose and has never run my battery down and I have had it plugged in all night one time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: but it gets warm and works great. If you have a long commute and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest electric blanket that you can buy. THIS IS FOR CARS ONLY. I almost returned this, but decided to give it as a gift to my girlfriend instead. She went ballistic the first time she plugged it into the car. Only has one heat setting, but it gets warm and works great. If you have a long commute and have trouble staying warm in the winter, you'll love this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pockrus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for short & long trips!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket!! My boyfriend and I travel an hour each way to visit his parents once a week. The car ride is usually miserable in the winter because I'm freezing and he's too hot. This blanket made all the difference! I'm toasty warm under my heated blanket and he's happy without the heat blasting. I've also found that even just the blanket helps keep me warmer for short trips when it doesn't have time to heat up. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it can be cleaned
customer_reviews.text: It says spot clean only, if I could gently hand wash and line dry at least I woud say 4 to 5 stars. I would prefer a longer on duration than 45min. It takes a few minutes to feel warm, but this is a great idea to use low power to heat, might buy a cover to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom as a Christmas gift because she is always cold and she loved it. Great for a road trip or car camping.
customer_reviews.author: Holden
